Introduction

"Chains" is a REST+JSON API to create and manage watch only wallets, generate new addresses, create (but not sign) and publish transactions, send notifications and query wallet balance and transaction list.

API Description

QA API Endpoint

http://chains-qa.37coins.io

Prod API Endpoint

https://chains.37coins.io

Authentication

"Chains" expects some of the requests to be signed with a known RSA key. The client has to provide additional headers in the request:
- X-37Coins-Nonce : nonce used to generate the signature
- X-37Coins-Signature : a signature created by signing the word "token" + nonce string. Nonce is usually a timestamp. Example of string to be signed: token12569537329.

API Endpoints
